title: The Little Dog in the Big Plague
description: The humans have no idea that a pandemic is on its way, but Ringo, the little dog, can smell the growing rot. It is everywhere: in their new neighborhood, in their old apartment complex, and in the bodies of Ringoâ€™s beloved family. What should a dog do when he survives a plague? Scared and confused, Ringo sets out on his journey.
author: C.C. Alma
